name: ruthenbeck.io
author: Greg Ruthenbeck <gerg.ruthenbeck@gmail.com>

scripts.init: cd studio && sanity init && lerna run graphql-deploy
scripts.start: lerna run empty-cache && lerna run start --parallel

description: This examples combines [Gatsby](https://www.gatsbyjs.org/) site generation with [Sanity](https://www.sanity.io) content management in a neat little company website. Read [the blog post](https://www.sanity.io/blog/get-started-with-gatsby-and-structured-content) and [see the getting started video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qU4lFYp3KiQ).
